description: Response of EntityHeaders for the children of a given parent Entity

nextPageToken.description: Token that can be used to get the next page.  Null if there are no more results.

totalChildCount.description: The total number of children with the requested parentId and types.  Only returned if requested.

sumFileSizesBytes.description: The sum of the file sizes (bytes) with the requested parentId and types. Only returned if requested.
